channel.title: Drugs on Alan Yeung
channel.description: Recent content in Drugs on Alan Yeung

item.title: A transient positive association between direct-acting antiviral therapy for hepatitis C infection and drug-related hospitalization among people who inject drugs: Self-controlled case-series analysis of national data
item.description: We investigated associations between outcomes and DAA treatment by comparing post-treatment to baseline periods using a within-subjects design

item.title: National increase in the community supply of take-home naloxone associated with a mass media campaign in Scotland: a segmented time series analysis
item.description: The aim of this study was to assess the effect of the ‘How to save a life’ campaign on the supply of take-home naloxone

item.title: Mortality among individuals prescribed opioid-agonist therapy in Scotland, UK, 2011-20: a national retrospective cohort study
item.description: We assessed the extent to which opioid-agonist therapy is protective against drug-related mortality in Scotland

item.title: A systematic review and meta-analysis of the prevalence of take-home naloxone (THN) ownership and carriage
item.description: This study aimed to assess the prevalence of ownership and carriage of Take-Home Naloxone internationally among people who use drugs
